name: Massima cura
desc: Candace's specialty. The aroma of this dish hits your nose long before it can be plated up. It would seem that Candace's adept guardianship also extends to sustaining appetites... But, uh, this really is an extraordinary amount of Aaru Mixed Rice. How are you supposed to deal with this mountain of "overflowing consideration"?

customize.name: Ricetta: riso misto di Aaru
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Aaru Mixed Rice.

customize.name: Riso
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Farina
customize.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

customize.name: Fagioli glabri
customize.desc: Un legume comune di Teyvat dal sapore delicato. Lo si può preparare in diversi modi, perciò è molto diffuso in tutto il mondo.

customize.name: Pomodoro
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Riso misto di Aaru
customize.desc: A large serving of filling staple food. In this dish that combines rice, noodles, and beans together, the secret of great taste lies in the sweet and sour flavor imparted by tomatoes. Owing to its common nature and low price, this dish is a great choice for sating one's hunger — which is one of the key reasons why this recipe has spread from Aaru Village to the rest of Sumeru.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc: Una discendente di Re Deshret, nonché protettrice del Villaggio di Aaru. Il suo occhio sinistro ha il colore dell'ambra.
